Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision occurrences out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision across all cases
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' activities

Name: Percentage of variants that include SW-Awaiting EIC Decision as a step before SW-EIC Accept
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Percentage of variants that include SW-Awaiting EIC Decision as a step before SW-EIC Reject
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'SW-EIC Reject'

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision occurrences that are directly preceded by SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision appearing after SW-Reviewer Agreed in the same case
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision occurrences that eventually lead to a final decision (SW-EIC Accept, SW-EIC Reject, SW-EIC Major Revision, or SW-EIC Minor Revision)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Ratio of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision occurrences to SW-Awaiting AE Assignment occurrences
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Percentage of cases where SW-Awaiting EIC Decision appears more than once
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that originate from a major revision cycle (i.e., contain RW-Initial Reviewer Selection)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' activities for cases where activity 'RW-Initial Reviewer Selection' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision steps that occur within 7 days after the last SW-Reviewer Agreed activity in the same case
Metric: the average of the function base < 7 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Number of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision occurrences that are not followed by any EIC decision activity within 30 days
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' does not occur

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision occurrences in cases that started with Immediate Reject Decision from the Checklist versus those that did not
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'Immediate Reject Decision from the Checklist'

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in comparison to other waiting states such as SW-Awaiting AE Assignment and SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision occurrences that are part of the most frequent variant pattern involving reviewer agreement and editorial decision
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Ratio of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision to total number of SW-* prefixed activities
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of cases containing SW-Reviewer Agreed that eventually reach SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision occurrences that follow at least two distinct SW-Reviewer Agreed events in the same case
Metric: the average of the function base > 2 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Fraction of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision steps that appear in variants with performance duration above the median case duration
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision per month to assess temporal workload distribution for Editors-in-Chief
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'", 'aggregation': 'total', 'group_by': 'time:timestamp'}"
